SELECT orders.ordersId, orders.ordersDate, orders.ordersPrice,
rc.resourceCategoryId, rc.resourceCategoryName,
rsc.resourceSubCategoryId, rsc.resourceSubCategoryName,
rs.itemId, rs.itemName, rs.itemPrice, rs.itemWriter, rs.resourceContent, rs.resourceImage,
rf.resourceFileId, rf.resourceFileName
FROM Orders orders INNER JOIN OrdersDetails od ON orders.ordersId = od.ordersId INNER JOIN ResourceShop rs ON rs.itemId = od.itemId LEFT JOIN ResourceSubCategory rsc ON rsc.resourceSubCategoryId = rs.resourceSubCategoryId LEFT JOIN ResourceCategory rc ON rc.resourceCategoryId = rsc.resourceCategoryId LEFT JOIN ResourceFile rf ON rf.itemId = rs.itemId
WHERE orders.userId = #{userId} ORDER BY rc.resourceCategoryId, rsc.resourceSubCategoryId, rs.itemId, rf.resourceFileId
